A cinematic through relentless industrial energy landscapes where a dynamic abstract mechanized entity, composed of metallic shards, light fragments, and electric energy pulses, traverses pulsating mechanical textures and glitch-infused environments under a cold steel gray and deep black palette accented by neon cyan, intense magenta, and vivid orange lights. The camera pushes in fast and glides rhythmically, moving continuously yet segmented to match increasing intensities; from the slow, tension-building forward drifts in minimal dark industrial space with glowing wires and flickering mechanized lights, through accelerating glitch patterns and neon abstract forms growing in complexity, to explosive shards bursting with neon light bursts and intense rhythmic flashes synchronized to the driving BPM, rotating and zooming rapidly in sync with percussion. The visual energy evolves through wide mechanical landscapes with sharp contrasts and cinematic atmosphere, building tension with glitch rhythms, then breaking down into spacious soft pulsating ambient industrial textures with slow orbital motion before rebuilding to a massive maximal cyan and magenta neon explosion swirling with layered shards and energy particles, finally dissolving subtly back into quiet metallic fragments and ambient darkness with gentle motion withdrawal

A vibrant, psychedelic natural landscape, giant bioluminescent alien fungi pulsing with light, strange plants that change color and shape, a canyon with rock formations melting into fractal patterns and spirals, a neon sky swirling with violet, green, and orange colors, surreal creatures made of glowing slime and shifting skin textures floating about, a hallucinatory and dreamlike atmosphere, kaleidoscopic details, photorealistic

nodes.title: 1.  MODEL REQUIREMENTS ‚¨áÔ∏è
widgets_values:
Note

Low Vram : 640 x 360  ->  Final Video after Upscale : 1280 x 720  (720p HD)

Mid Vram : 960 x 512  ->  Final Video after Upscale : 1080 x 1024 (Full HD)

High Vram : 1280 x 704  ->  Final Video after Upscale : 2560 x 1408 (2K)

V. High Vram : 1920 x 1024  ->  Final Video after Upscale : 3840 x 2048 (4K)

nodes.title: 1.  MODEL REQUIREMENTS ‚¨áÔ∏è
widgets_values:
---

# üìê Standard Video Resolutions (Landscape / Horizontal)

| Name                | WIDTH (px)       | HEIGHT (px)       | Aspect Ratio | Common Use                    |
| ------------------- | ---------------- | ----------------- | ------------ | ----------------------------- |
| **480p (SD)**       | **854 (width)**  | **480 (height)**  | 16:9         | Previews, testing             |
| **720p (HD)**       | **1280 (width)** | **720 (height)**  | 16:9         | Drafts, lightweight streaming |
| **900p**            | **1600 (width)** | **900 (height)**  | 16:9         | Non-standard intermediate     |
| **1080p (Full HD)** | **1920 (width)** | **1080 (height)** | 16:9         | YouTube, music videos         |
| **1440p (2K)**      | **2560 (width)** | **1440 (height)** | 16:9         | High quality                  |
| **2160p (4K UHD)**  | **3840 (width)** | **2160 (height)** | 16:9         | Final master                  |

---

# üì± Vertical Video (Reels / Shorts / TikTok)

| Name               | WIDTH (px)       | HEIGHT (px)       | Aspect Ratio | Use                   |
| ------------------ | ---------------- | ----------------- | ------------ | --------------------- |
| **480p Vertical**  | **480 (width)**  | **854 (height)**  | 9:16         | Testing               |
| **720p Vertical**  | **720 (width)**  | **1280 (height)** | 9:16         | Basic Instagram       |
| **1080p Vertical** | **1080 (width)** | **1920 (height)** | 9:16         | Reels, TikTok         |
| **1440p Vertical** | **1440 (width)** | **2560 (height)** | 9:16         | High quality vertical |
| **4K Vertical**    | **2160 (width)** | **3840 (height)** | 9:16         | Vertical master       |

---

# üü¶ Square Video (1:1)

| WIDTH (px)       | HEIGHT (px)       | Aspect Ratio | Use            |
| ---------------- | ----------------- | ------------ | -------------- |
| **480 (width)**  | **480 (height)**  | 1:1          | Preview        |
| **720 (width)**  | **720 (height)**  | 1:1          | Light feed     |
| **1080 (width)** | **1080 (height)** | 1:1          | Instagram feed |
| **2048 (width)** | **2048 (height)** | 1:1          | Artwork / AI   |

---

# üé¨ Cinematic / Wide Formats

| Name          | WIDTH (px)       | HEIGHT (px)       | Aspect Ratio | Use            |
| ------------- | ---------------- | ----------------- | ------------ | -------------- |
| **Cinema HD** | **1920 (width)** | **800 (height)**  | ~2.39:1      | Cinematic look |
| **2K Scope**  | **2048 (width)** | **858 (height)**  | 2.39:1       | Digital cinema |
| **4K Scope**  | **4096 (width)** | **1716 (height)** | 2.39:1       | Pro cinema     |

---

# ‚öôÔ∏è Platform Recommendations (Width √ó Height)

| Platform               | Resolution                                                           |
| ---------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **YouTube**            | **1920 (width) √ó 1080 (height)** or **3840 (width) √ó 2160 (height)** |
| **Instagram Reels**    | **1080 (width) √ó 1920 (height)**                                     |
| **Spotify Canvas**     | **720 (width) √ó 1280 (height)** or **1080 (width) √ó 1920 (height)**  |
| **TikTok**             | **1080 (width) √ó 1920 (height)**                                     |
| **Main Stage Visuals** | **1920 (width) √ó 1080 (height)** or **2560 (width) √ó 1440 (height)** |

---

# üß† CRITICAL RULE FOR AI (Stable Diffusion / ComfyUI)

> **ALWAYS use WIDTH and HEIGHT values divisible by 64**

### ‚úÖ AI-SAFE RESOLUTIONS (explicit width / height)

| WIDTH (px)       | HEIGHT (px)       | Notes                       |
| ---------------- | ----------------- | --------------------------- |
| **1280 (width)** | **720 (height)**  | Safe HD                     |
| **1536 (width)** | **864 (height)**  | Best quality / VRAM balance |
| **1920 (width)** | **1088 (height)** | AI-safe Full HD             |
| **3840 (width)** | **2176 (height)** | AI-safe 4K                  |

### ‚ùå NOT IDEAL DURING AI GENERATION

| WIDTH (px)       | HEIGHT (px)       | Why                        |
| ---------------- | ----------------- | -------------------------- |
| **1920 (width)** | **1080 (height)** | Height not divisible by 64 |
| **3840 (width)** | **2160 (height)** | Height not divisible by 64 |

(You can still use these for **final export**, just not for generation.)

---

# üî• Pro Workflow Recommendations (Music + AI Visuals)

| Use Case            | WIDTH (px)       | HEIGHT (px)       |
| ------------------- | ---------------- | ----------------- |
| Testing / previews  | **1280 (width)** | **720 (height)**  |
| Vertical socials    | **1080 (width)** | **1920 (height)** |
| YouTube AI-safe     | **1920 (width)** | **1088 (height)** |
| Long ComfyUI videos | **1536 (width)** | **864 (height)**  |
| Master archive      | **3840 (width)** | **2160 (height)** |

---

## üéØ Absolute Rule to Remember

* **WIDTH = horizontal size**
* **HEIGHT = vertical size**
* **Order is always: WIDTH √ó HEIGHT**

If you want next, I can:

* Make a **one-page printable cheat sheet**
* Create **ComfyUI presets (JSON)**
* Map **resolutions vs VRAM limits**
* Optimize **Instagram / Spotify / YouTube from one master**

Just tell me what you want next.

A vast industrial interior formed of dense, rusted metal girders locked in a tense, slow cyclical vibration ‚Äî each metal beam moves imperceptibly but relentlessly, as if forced into mechanical obedience beneath crushing unseen pressure, the floor repeating a tight, heavy rhythm of worn concrete slabs stepping down in rigid succession.
The girders‚Äô vibration sharpens into a crisp, metallic ticking, small fractures appearing as deep fissures that pulse but do not yet fracture; shadows flicker along the heavy beams as dozens of identical mechanical pistons along the floor pump in slow syncopated motion, forcing the whole scene into tighter compression with a barely perceptible pulse layering over the cyclical movement.
The pistons speed up, their stroke shortening and intensifying; this causes the concrete floor panels to warp subtly, edges curling upward then snapping back like brittle paper caught in slow oscillation, while the girders‚Äô fissures stretch slightly but remain intact, producing an ambient metallic hiss that saturates the enclosed space with high-frequency friction.
Fragments of aged industrial wiring hang loosely, swinging with the renewed rhythmic pressure, slowly unraveling threads of insulation that shudder and decay into thin dust particles caught in a low drift, circling sluggishly within shafts of harsh spotlighting that slice through rising particulate haze.
The wheat-colored dust thickens, accumulating on the floor in patches shaped by the mechanical rhythm; beneath this layer, floor panels begin to bow outward, spatial compression bending the entire plane into a vast curved surface, transforming the once-rigid flatness into a slowly undulating, creaking tension field.
The girders pulse with increased frequency, causing the rust to flake off in rhythmic cascades that scatter over the warped floor, the flakes caught mid-air by the pistons‚Äô motion, forming shifting strata of particulate that obscure the bare concrete beneath‚Äîthese layers grow denser, grinding lightly against each other in perpetual motion.
A repetitive mechanical clicking repeats with clockwork precision as long rows of large, rectangular ventilation grates embedded in the walls vibrate in unison, their edges beginning to warp outward like metal ribbons stretched to breaking, pressing invisibly against the decaying dust and warped floor, compressing the entire environment into tighter constriction.
The grates‚Äô deformation fractures further, releasing slow cascades of translucent, oily mist that drifts upward and clings to overhead piping; this mist thickens steadily, softening edges and creating a shallow fog that distorts the geometry while the mechanical clicking becomes muffled and stifled beneath its weight.
Within the fog, suspended shards of broken glass from unseen windows hover and rotate slowly, catching hard light that shifts in subtle tension-oscillation synchronized to an unseen pulsation ‚Äî these shards reflect distorted fragments of the girders and pistons, fracturing the space into a kaleidoscopic resonance of diminishing structural clarity.
The shards increasingly collide gently with each other mid-air, chipping edges further and causing a slow drift downward, as the entire mist-thickened volume compresses slightly, spatial constraints forcing the shards to take on a layered stacking, forming a fragile, oscillating lattice that fills the lower half of the environment.
The lattice presses downward on the warped floor, which responds with minute reversed oscillations, causing weak cracks to spiderweb beneath the dust strata as the environment‚Äôs compression reaches a critical build, the pistons‚Äô motion shortening to jittery spasms and the girders‚Äô vibration rising to a relentless metallic drone.
Thin, abstract humanoid figures emerge slowly from the lattice, barely defined etched silhouettes formed from drifting dust and mist; they stand motionless, arranged in tight, repetitive rows facing inward with uniform posture and no movement, their presence scaled to intimidate, serving as inert nodes within the mechanical system.
The figures begin to pulse subtly with the mechanical rhythm, synchronized head tilts and shoulder shifts manifesting as robotic precision oscillations that soon lock into a cruelly repetitive jerk, their form losing definition as their outlines fragment into fragments of motion blur that accumulate as ephemeral dust clouds.
Above the figures, the girders‚Äô fissures widen sharply, releasing sudden thin streams of sparking electrical discharge, flickering erratically but constrained within the rusty surfaces, the sparks etching crackling arcs that erode segments of metal but never sever, feeding the environment‚Äôs growing instability.
The mist thickens rapidly, consuming the lower field in opaque layers, forcing the dust lattice and figures to dissolve into near invisibility; spatial sensation flattens as broken light refracts through the fog, causing perceived depth to twist and collapse into semi-transparent planes that pulse statically with internal compression.
Wall-mounted industrial lamps flare unevenly, their harsh white light dimming into short spasms of intensity before fading almost completely, then reigniting in sync with an accelerating drone that shrills over the mechanical tone; this action destabilizes the fog layers, causing undulating waves of opaque shadow to cross the space like slow tidal rolls.
The floor beneath the fog bulges upward suddenly, thick and viscous like molten concrete held under extreme pressure, texture tearing with glints of darkened rust as it shifts into large, uneven bulges that roll forward incrementally, each pulsation increasing spatial tension against the mist‚Äôs weight.
The humanoid dust figures pulsate within the fog, now fragmented into floating, rotating shards of particulate motion that break apart and reassemble with jerky repetition, their outlines becoming more skeletal, the empty spaces between particles growing like voids, reducing them to unstable silhouettes.
The sputtering electrical arcs quicken, causing fissure fractures in the girders to lengthen and intertwine, releasing intermittent jets of faintly glowing dust that swirl chaotically upward, mutating the rigid grid into an unstable, tangled mass of worn metallic threads vulnerable to rupture.
The thick fog momentarily clears as an intense mechanical drop is felt ‚Äî the pistons halt briefly, pressure released, allowing the whole environment to pause in hollow suspension, the lattice of dust and shattered humanoid fragments frozen mid-decay, the spatial depth receding into echoing darkness.
A deep bass pulse returns, driving the pistons back at heightened speed; the girders bend savagely with audible groaning, metal surfaces splintering internally as warped edges curl violently inward, compressing the entire industrial frame into a collapsing, crushing funnel that forces every element into tighter, violent proximity.
The dust lattice rebuilds from scattered fragments with accelerating fractal repetition, forming a dense, crystalline aggregate that rises erratically, imposing a jagged, geometric obstruction that pushes into the space above the pistons, further constricting movement and increasing pressure.
The humanoid silhouettes remanifest within this dust aggregation, now reduced to flickering, half-visible shadows smeared across the jagged surfaces‚Äîeach identically rigid, forced into fixed postures that suggest erasure of individual will by the crushing mechanic force.
Sharp rhythmic vibrations fracture the newly formed dust lattice intermittently, peeling away thin veneers of particulate that cascade down to the floor‚Äôs molten bulges, adding layers to the viscous surface which now writhes with violent bubbling and sudden ruptures.
The pistons‚Äô motion devolves into spasmodic twitching, pushing the molten floor to sudden jerk upward motions that resonate through the jagged dust lattice, causing chaotic collisions between fragile humanoid dust fragments and cascading dust shards from the lattice edges.
The electrical discharges between girders evolve into harsh white arcs that jump unpredictably across the lattice, vaporizing portions of dust and bone-thin humanoid fragments, leaving blackened hollows which quickly fill with pulsating electromagnetic haze ‚Äî this haze writhes unnaturally, filling the cracks with twitching fictional life.
Luminescence from electrical haze fluctuates in rhythmic tension, producing harsh shadows that dance erratically on warped girders and luminous dust planes; the environment‚Äôs volume contracts visibly, creating an oppressive bubble that seems to choke spatial extents and further distort mechanical repetition.
The massive distorted volume‚Äôs edges split sharply as jagged fractures tear through girders and floor, extra-dimensional gaps opening into static black voids that resist the compression, exposing remnants of fragmented dust and vaporized humanoid residue spinning slowly in the collapse.
Within these voids, intermittent flashes of male spoken vocal pulses manifest as brief warped echoes of light and shadow, bending local perception and compressing the surrounding mist and dust in reactive waves before collapsing again, imposing psychological pressure onto spatial awareness.
The fog and haze return fully, blending with the black voids to form an indistinct ocean of gray, within which the dust lattice becomes indistinguishable from the viscous floor, losing definition as repeated rhythmic tension bleeds all edges into one continuous textured field of suspended entropy.
The pulsating mechanical rhythm reasserts control rudely, forcing the continuous field to ripple and fold like a viscous skin over a trapped mass; periodic mechanical clicks burst as microfractures propagate, causing surface peeling spots of dust and rust that periodically slough off and vanish into the formless mist below.
The humanoid fragments shimmer faintly and briefly reaggregate as ghostly outlines within the textured field, indistinct and pulsing weakly at the distorted bass pulse, becoming increasingly transparent and fragmented with each repetition, eventually dissolving into kinetic static and dust.
Fragments of collapsed girders‚Äô rusted metal twist visibly beneath the surface, embedded in the viscous field, pushed slowly by invisible forces into abstract shapes that slide, fold, and press repeatedly into one another as if trapped in relentless tectonic compression.
Mechanical pistons reconfigure into a congested cluster beneath the viscous surface, pushing jagged segments of the floor to shift in brutal, spasmodic jerks that force the entire mass of dust, mist, and metal fragments into convulsive pulses of chaotic compression.
Suddenly a sonic drop empties pressure; the entire viscous field shudders to a sudden halt, the darkness thickens and the rhythmic pulse disappears, leaving only slow swirling patterns of residual dust, mist, and tiny glimmers of residual electrical sparks flickering in sparse isolation.
The remaining humanoid dust fragments lie scattered and motionless, some half-submerged in viscous layers, others drifting slowly in widescale turbulence of the mist-filled void, their shapes losing cohesion as time breaks down the habitual repetition.
A delicate whisper of male spoken vocal refrains pulsing faintly vibrates through the silent space, the ghostly cadence warping the mist into frail rhythmic undulations that barely lift dust layers, evoking confined psychological tension within the vast emptiness.
Pressure rebuilds slowly as the mechanical pistons jerk into erratic motion again beneath viscous layers, disorderly spasms that incrementally coalesce into more regular, synchronized beats, pushing folds of dust and rusted metal fragments upward into jagged evolving formations.
Jagged formations sharpen into teeth-like rigid sequences that bite into the void, pulsating with growing force‚Äîeach peak of metal and dust fragment reflecting fragmented glimmers of last vestiges of light, while oscillations push the formations into spasmodic rhythmic compression cycles.
Dense clouds of mist swell aggressively around these formations, invading cracks and hollows with kinetic energy that distorts edges further, causing surfaces to appear flexed and near bursting under pressure as the sonic momentum intensifies.
The humanoid dust figures reappear briefly, assembled into a rigid wall facing the pulsating formations, standing perfectly still and locked in repetitive synchronized trembling that intensifies gradually, representing behavioral normalization under increasing system pressure.
Electric arcs jump faster and wider between the jagged formations and figures, stimulating sharp flickers of light that accelerate the fragmentation of both dust and metal, forcing the environment‚Äôs texture into a frantic state of partial structural breakdown and renewal.
The mist and dust coalesce into large, amorphous rolling clouds that engulf the scene, compressing and folding over the jagged formations into a thick, crashing ocean of textured grey‚Äîthis mass convulses with mechanical breath, containing within it the fragmented figures and broken metal as indistinct components locked in systemic collapse.
The mechanical rhythm becomes relentless, each beat hammering through the viscous mass, driving chaotic interior pulses that violently churn textures as the entire world seems to strain against impossible spatial constraints, pushing all elements beyond visible deformation thresholds.
Within this saturated mass, glimmering shards of broken forms briefly realign then shatter repeatedly, emitting thin ghost echoes of male vocal strains that fold into and reinforce the oppressive tension, escalating the claustrophobic psychological pressure layered beneath the visual storm.
The jerky pulses stretch and compress the entire space like a breathing cell torn at its membrane edges, until the textures dissolve into a kinetic haze of dust, mist, and fractured metal fragments swirling with furious intensity around ghostly faint silhouettes of the humanoid residue‚Äîvisually unresolved, unstable, forced to exist.
